level.heading: Judicial review of Mayor's decision.
level.text: Any person aggrieved by a decision of the Mayor, or as to whose claim the Mayor has failed to hold a hearing within a reasonable time pursuant to § 41- 125(a), may have such claim reviewed pursuant to § 2-510.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 41-101.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 26 of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act). See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
